column1: Kata Robata////My parents ordered the beef skewers
column2: which I had to eat one. These are melt in your mouth beef. Seriously
column3: one of my favorite things here in this restaurant. They also ordered the spicy soy ramen which was full of flavor and the noodles were cooked perfectly. They also ordered a ton of other stuff which I didn't really try because of the omakase
